sect2.title: Introduction to intltool
sect2.para: The intltool package contains an internationalization tool. This is useful for extracting translatable strings from source files, collecting the extracted strings with messages from traditional source files (<source directory>/<package>/po) and merging the translations into .xml, .desktop and .oaf files.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The intltool package contains intltoolize, intltool-update, intltool-extract, intltool-merge and intltool-prepare.

sect3.title: intltoolize
sect3.para: intltoolize prepares a package to use intltool.

sect3.title: intltool-update
sect3.para: intltool-update updates the po template files and merges them with the translations.

sect3.title: intltool-extract
sect3.para: intltool-extract generates header files that can be read by gettext.

sect3.title: intltool-merge
sect3.para: intltool-merge merges translated strings into various file types.

sect3.title: intltool-prepare
sect3.para: intltool-prepare updates pot files and merges them with translation files.
